metadata.Title: CVE-2015-7697 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description:
Info-ZIP UnZip 6.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (infinite loop) via empty bzip2 data in a ZIP archive.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-7697` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

unzip - 6.0-9ubuntu1.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: unzip package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.0-9ubuntu1.4').
